title: "C3.ai Stock Upgraded After Announcing Job Cuts"
excerpt: "To follow, Oppenheimer upgraded C3.ai stock to \"outperform\" from \"perform\" this morning, citing the company's AI strength, accelerating growth, and margin expansion. Still, 11 of the 14 analysts in coverage rate the stock a \"hold\" or worse, indicating there is still room for additional upgrades."
